data.text: @nzherald Well good luck to them, this will all end up in the courts.

@nzherald You wanna hope they don’t start court proceedings like Police and Military. If this happens and it’s awarded there could be unfair dismissal claims and the tax payer will have to foot the bill. I don’t think this will please the tax payer considering the cost-of-living crisis 😬

@VPoingdestre1 @nzherald So often that's a countdown to a YouTube link featuring a paid influencer, or a discredited medic boosting a private practice profile by getting more social media clicks. Very rarely is it ever peer reviewed in any reliable way. Usually just a bad case of confirmation bias.
@Fredtheted7 @RyCStudio2 @oceanblue76547 @nzherald There is plenty of evidence, if you actually want to read it
@TitaniaMcLeod @profitdoctornz @nzherald @jacindaardern @nzlabour The same can be said for National. No sane person would vote for either party.

@FrogmarchWasp4 @profitdoctornz @nzherald @jacindaardern It's a risk I'd be willing to take. You can give up on your efforts to persuade otherwise. Never voted @nzlabour and certainly never would after their current shambles of a government.
@TitaniaMcLeod @profitdoctornz @nzherald @jacindaardern And they might be more heinous and despicable than hers ...
